title: Smartphone-powered device tests blood samples for genetic conditions
description: A cheap, lightweight smartphone-powered device can test for DNA in blood, urine and other samples in a fraction of the time it takes to test in a lab
content:
By Alice Klein
The DNA test relies on a smartphone instead of lab equipment
